item.description:
The last Pirates Hockey game was a success, why not keep a good thing going!   Lets meet at 6:15 to get tickets and get situated. There are concession stands available at the civic center.

Do not buy tickets until you find the group so we can all sit together! If you have difficulty finding us, please call/text  me at the number listed at the bottom.

Game Night Promotion (Several of them):

  • Steve Poapst Bobblehead Night, Presented by Moody’s Collision Centers. The first 1,000 fans to enter the turnstiles will receive the third bobblehead in a series of four.
  • Boy Scout Night: The Portland Pirates and the Pine Tree Council of the Boy Scouts of America would like to welcome back Boy Scouts as well as their families and friends to a special Boy Scout Night to welcome all scout troops!
  • Good Shepherd Food Bank Night: All fans will receive two tickets to a future Pirates game for donating a non-perishable food item to the Good Shepherd Food Bank.
  • Green Night:
  • All tickets for Boy Scouts, family and friends, are just $12.00 each, and all Boy Scouts attending the game will receive a commemorative Portland Pirates Scout Night scout patch!  Boy Scouts are also encouraged to wear their scout uniform to the game.

 

 

03/15//2013 (Saturday Hockey Night in Portland! ) - 7 p.m. vs. WB-Scratton (Pennsylvania)

Please contact me if you have any questions. Before night of event: 207 655-9103 or adamdesignweb@yahoo.com  Night of event: 207-482-9536
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the main lobby near the ticket booth. Wearing a Pirates Jersey. We will meet near the ATM in the lobby. The ATM is right across the ticket booths.
